page.title: 10Rushett Farm
page.content:
Rushett Farm is a farm of some 800 acres.500 of which are used for cereals and oil-seed rape.The cereals grown are wheat and barley.Half of the wheat is used for bread and biscuits etc.the other half of the wheat is used for animal feed.All of the barley is used for animal feed The oil-seed rape seeds are black and 40% oil.The oil is used for cooking oil and also it is used in the making of margarine.
BEEF,the farm has 200 suckling calves Each cow has 1 calf a year.The calves are taken away from their mother at 9 months old. Some of the cattle are sold for fatterning but the rest are fatterned on the farm. The main breeds are Charolais, Limousin and Simmental.
